name: Railway
description: Railway is the all-in-one intelligent cloud provider. We make it easy to deploy anything with one click from 1,800+ templates, and a commission system that's already paid out nearly $1M to creators. Now we're joining the Open Source Pledge to directly fund the Open Source projects our community deploys every day.
shortDescription: We're joining the Open Source Pledge to directly fund the Open Source projects our community deploys every day.
